amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the exemption of the NEPA waiver for small conduits on Federal land from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the exemption for small conduit hydropower development from the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 253 (Roll no. 98).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Napolitano.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 253 (Roll no. 98).
